title: web sessions
extract: (1) The session of activity that a user with a unique IP address spends on a Web siteduring a specified period of time. The number of user sessions on a site is used in measuring the amount of traffic a Web site gets. The site administrator determines what the time frame of a user session will be (e.g., 30 minutes).
extract_html: (1) The session of activity that a user with a unique IP address spends on a Web siteduring a specified period of time. The number of user sessions on a site is used in measuring the amount of traffic a Web site gets. The site administrator determines what the time frame of a user session will be (e.g., 30 minutes).
